Text:
awwwwww, congratz on 1000th!!! :)
many many thanks from all us small folks here ;)
dude congrats on your 1000th upload, and a thousand thank yous for all the work you do here, cheers man!
Congratulations!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Thank you from all of us poor comic lovers :D

Congratulations mirrormaster82 on your 1000th upload. A while back you were most probably the only good comic uploader on TPB, now there are are a few other good ones around. But, frankly speaking... you are still the MASTER :)!!! I live in Pakistan, the only access to comics we have here are second hand, dog-eared and usually from the 80s :P. You are the only way i can keep up with all the latest comics. So keep uploading, i'll be waiting for your 2000th upload... Thanks for everything dude, I speak for all of us here when i say your work is greatly apprecaited!!! :D
Thank you sooo much for all your hard work. We are forever in your debt and we are eternally grateful =)
I'd actually created my account to thank you for your uploads.
Thx for all uploads dude. Also just created the account to be able to thank you for all.
I got all my comics from you and you inspired me to start uploading.

A landmark issue (and a perfect jumping on point for new readers)!

We who are about to read salute you.
Not interested in this comic, just wanted to say congrats and thank you.
Thnx - could've been saying that a 1000 times by now, but somehow the time is lacking to do that ;-)
Yahhhhhhhhh Congrats man, I've been on your torrent page every Wednesday for about half year now, all I gotta say is tyvm.
